name: @waylay/waylayGetLatestItem
description:
waylay sensor that returns the latest data of the resource stored in the Cloud Cache.
Fetches the statistical values and provide it as the rawData for the waylay platform, for more info, please check documentation. Input parameters are:
  • resource
  • domain
If resource is NOT defined as the input parameter, sensor takes as a resource what is defined as a resource on the node or task level.
Domain is a domain in which your platfrom is hosted
